articles.title: How Electric Thrusters Are Revolutionizing Space Exploration - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A research team at the University of Virginia is revolutionizing the future of space travel with groundbreaking studies on electric propulsion thrusters. By delving into the behavior of electrons in plasma beams, their work promises to enhance spacecraft effi…
articles.content:
Pictured is a 6 kW Hall thruster in operation at the NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory. Credit: NASA
